title: Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 2
description:
Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 2:

We have 30 titles in this upload:

-  Aronson (Ed.) - Meyler's Side Effects of Psychiatric Drugs (2009)

-  Bobgan - Psycho Heresy; the Psychological Seduction of Christianity (1987)

-  Busch & Sandberg - Psychotherapy and Medication; the Challenge of Integration (2007)

-  Cleckley - The Mask of Sanity, 5e (1988)

-  Damousi - Freud in the Antipodes; a Cultural History of Psychoanalysis in Australia (2005)

-  DiCenso - The Other Freud; Religion, Culture and Psychoanalysis (1999)

-  Douard & Schultz - Monstrous Crimes and the Failure of Forensic Psychiatry (2013)

-  Farber - The Spiritual Gift of Madness; the Failure of Psychiatry and the Rise of the Mad Pride Movement (2012)

-  Glasser - Warning; Psychiatry Can Be Hazardous to Your Mental Health (2003)

-  Gosden - Punishing the Patient; How Psychiatrists Misunderstand and Mistreat Schizophrenia (2001)

-  Graumann & Gergen (Eds.) - Historical Dimensions of Psychological Discourse (1996)

-  Greenberg - The Book of Woe; the DSM and the Unmaking of Psychiatry (2013)

-  Grof - LSD Psychotherapy (1979)

-  Incayawar et al (Eds.) - Psychiatrists and Traditional Healers; Unwitting Partners in Global Mental Health (2009)

-  Jung - Freud and Psychoanalysis (1961)

-  Jung - Psychology and the Occult (1977)

-  Kugelmann - Psychology and Catholicism; Contested Boundaries (2011)

-  L'Abate - Clinical Psychology and Psychotherapy as a Science; an Iconoclastic Perspective (2013)

-  Lapping - Psychoanalysis in Social Research; Shifting Theories and Reframing Concepts (2011)

-  Meerloo - The Rape of the Mind (1956)

-  Mowrer - The Crisis in Psychiatry and Religion (1961)

-  Nye - Three Psychologies; Perspectives from Freud, Skinner, and Rogers, 6e (2000)

-  Perry- Behind the Shock Machine; the Untold Story of the Notorious Milgram Psychology Experiment (2012)

-  Petrucelli (Ed.) - Kowing, Not-Knowing & Sort-of-Knowing; Psychoanalysis and the Experience of Uncertainty (2010)

-  Roazen - The Trauma of Freud; Controversies in Psychoanalysis (2002)

-  Robinson - Freud and His Critics (1993)

-  Robinson - The Don Quixote of Psychiatry (1919)

-  Schumaker - The Corruption of Reality; a Unified Theory of Religion, Hypnosis, and Psychopathology (1995)

-  Storr - Freud; a Very Short Introduction (1989)

-  Whitaker - Anatomy of an Epidemic; Magic Bullets, Psychiatric Drugs, and the Astonishing Rise of Mental Illness in America (2010)
